Surge Docs - LLM Full Context (Earn SDK)

This file provides a compact but complete model-friendly context for Surge Earn SDK integration.

Overview
- SDK package: @surge/earn-sdk
- Target users: wallet teams and frontend web apps
- Primary network: Base Sepolia
- Use cases: market listing, user position reads, deposits, withdrawals, exposure settings, activity feed

Network Defaults
- chainId: 84532
- Liquidity Pool: 0xA40C833639803132D409E344d1CB9A9DD5aAB411
- USDC: 0x036CbD53842c5426634e7929541eC2318f3dCF7e

Setup Example
1) Install dependencies:
   npm install @surge/earn-sdk viem
2) Build public client:
   createSurgeEarnPublicClient("https://sepolia.base.org", baseSepolia)
3) Optional wallet client for writes
4) Construct SDK client with SURGE_BASE_SEPOLIA_CONFIG

Read Methods
- listMarkets
- getUserPosition
- getUserExposures
- getWalletUsdcBalance
- getAllowance

Write Methods
- approveMaxUsdc
- deposit
- withdrawByUsdc
- withdrawByLpTokens
- setExposure

Event/Activity Methods
- listDepositEvents
- listWithdrawEvents
- listActivity
- getUserActivity

React Hooks
- useEarnMarkets
- useEarnPortfolio
- useEarnActivity

Recommended UX flow for invest
- Read USDC balance first
- Validate amount <= wallet USDC
- Check allowance and approve max when needed
- Submit deposit and wait for receipt
- Refresh portfolio and activity after confirmation

Test Wallet Notes
- Supports mnemonic create/import
- Persists mnemonic in local storage
- Includes Base Sepolia funding helper links
- Supports approve+deposit invest flow when USDC exists
